rescuecore2.misc.java

Class LoadableTypeProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.misc.java.LoadableTypeProcessor

  • public class LoadableTypeProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for processing loadable types from jar files.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LoadableTypeProcessor.EntityFactoryRegisterCallback
      A LoadableTypeCallback that will registry EntityFactory implementations.
      static class  LoadableTypeProcessor.MessageFactoryRegisterCallback
      A LoadableTypeCallback that will registry MessageFactory implementations.
      static class  LoadableTypeProcessor.PropertyFactoryRegisterCallback
      A LoadableTypeCallback that will registry PropertyFactory implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • addFactoryRegisterCallbacks

        public void addFactoryRegisterCallbacks(Registry registry)
        Add the message, property and entity factory register callbacks.
        Parameters:
        registry - The Registry to register factory classes with.

      • addCallback

        public void addCallback(LoadableTypeCallback callback)
        Add a LoadableTypeCallback function.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to add.

      • addConfigUpdater

        public void addConfigUpdater(LoadableType type,
                    Config config,
                    java.lang.String configKey)
        Add a config updating callback. This will append class names to a Config entry when a particular LoadableType returns an acceptable class.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to look for.
        config - The config to update.
        configKey - The key to update.

      • setDeepInspection

        public void setDeepInspection(boolean newDeep)
        Set whether to do a "deep" inspection or just inspect the manifest. If true then all entries will be tested to see if they match the target regex and class.
        Parameters:
        newDeep - Whether to do a deep inspection or not.

      • setDirectory

        public void setDirectory(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name of the directory to process.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the directory.

      • process

        public void process()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Process all jars in a directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading the jar files.

      • processJarFile

        public void processJarFile(java.util.jar.JarFile jar)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Inspect an individual jar file for loadable types.
        Parameters:
        jar - The jar file to inspect.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading the jar file.
